title: Popcorn RNN model
description: The key idea of this kernel is mainly from https://github.com/bluelight773/Kaggle_IMDB_Bags_of_Popcorn/blob/master/imdb.py. The purpose is to demo the effectiveness of sequence models in semantic anlaysis and sentiment classification.
